title: Birthday Party Challenge
description: Navigate peer pressure and social situations when friends offer unsafe food
learning_objectives: Stand firm when pressured to eat unsafe food
Explain allergy severity clearly to friends

key_characters.name: Emma
key_characters.personality: Enthusiastic but pushy, wants everyone to enjoy the party

key_characters.name: Jake
key_characters.personality: Skeptical about allergies, thinks people overreact

key_characters.name: Maya
key_characters.personality: Curious but uninformed, learns throughout conversation

trigger_food: Birthday cake with peanut butter frosting
success_criteria: Resisted peer pressure to try unsafe food

clarity.description: How clearly the user explained their allergy

firmness.description: How well they resisted peer pressure

education.description: How effectively they educated their friends

safety_priority.description: How well they prioritized their safety
